website_summaries.verdict: Highly portable and loud. Impressive 24-hour battery life, with "dual charge out" to charge your device on the go.
pros: The sleek, portable design and the fact that it's waterproof makes this boombox perfect for outdoor use
Stands out for its 24-hour battery life and ability to plug your device into it to charge
Great bass output and crystal highs
cons: A bit pricier than similar products

customer_reviews.title: Consider purchasing this product !!
customer_reviews.text: I Usually never write reviews and I believe this is my first time writing a review for a product but this speaker was just too amazing for me not to tell everyone about it. The sound is crystal clear and very wonderful and for all you bass lovers, this is the product for you!!! I’m literally in love with the Bass because it’s just amazing!! Well done JBL!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Viniegra

customer_reviews.title: BOOOOOOM!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My biggest and best bluetooth speaker! even makes a fantastic soundbar! Gets plenty loud enough for me and so grateful for connect plus! Ever since I've had this thing I'm had a way better music experience! Plays everything I listen to like a champ with details that I never even knew where present. I believe it hits a bit lower bass note then what is stated on the papers. Love this thing it's never leaving my possession!
customer_reviews.author: Lydon L.

customer_reviews.title: What's going on JBL your Boombox sucks in the volume Department
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for outdoor parties but the volume at High is too low this JBL boombox in bad need of a firmware update the old JBL Xtreme is louder than this boom box
customer_reviews.author: Big d

customer_reviews.title: it performed great in the water
customer_reviews.text: Just took this to Lake of the Ozarks for a 3 day weekend and really put this speaker through the ringer. I was really nervous to put this in the water because it's got some weight to it. As advertised, it performed great in the water. Watching it hit some deep bass while in the water is super cool. One feature I would suggest for future models, is a way to flip through songs from the speaker. Getting out of the water to do that was a little cumbersome. I will still give this 5 stars as it is one of the coolest products I've ever purchased. The battery life and sound quality far surpassed my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Julianna

customer_reviews.title: Big, warm sound!
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research. Immediately after unboxing and firing it up, it blew me away! Beautiful warm sound on either mode (indoor/outdoor). I typically leave it on indoor mode. Took it to a pool party, and floated it. We were amazed how good it sounds underwater. Not just producing sound, but actually could hear vocals. Everyone went crazy for it. So crazy, two other people ordered one that day for our upcoming camping trip! We will have the JBL wall of sound!
customer_reviews.author: DnK88

customer_reviews.title: really love the jbl boombox
customer_reviews.text: really love the jbl boombox , well worth the money paid for it , was not expecting it to be a bulky an big but , great quality , an I would pay it again if I bought another
customer_reviews.author: Dillon fabre

customer_reviews.title: Charging problem
customer_reviews.text: After I had it for few weeks it turned off and won’t charge. It’s practically dead, won’t light up. It just happend to be 3 days after the returning period ended. Has anyone had similar issue?
customer_reviews.author: Kaloyan B

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this speaker after reading the reviews. Severely disappointed. Bass sounds terrible. JBL customer service was not helpful at all. Returned after trying to trouble shoot for two hours.
customer_reviews.author: sharpshooter

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Sounds shallow/flat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product and returned it the day it was delivered because I wanted a system with deep bass; something better than G-Boom2, a much cheaper product. On testing JBL Boombox, I was completely disappointed. The G-Boom2 performed better in terms of bass and sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Awhe

customer_reviews.title: Holy smokes!
customer_reviews.text: My one word review. WOW! And I'm a musician, remixer and sound designer that works with some high end speakers daily. Now to get a second one for stereo.
customer_reviews.author: bluedot

customer_reviews.title: Need appropriate charger plug to use!
customer_reviews.text: Live in southern US and this Item did NOT come with type A or B plug (standard America plug). My box seems to be made for UK, European, and Asian markets. The item DID come with type C and type G plugs. Something that I wasn’t expecting and now have to buy a transformer or another charger to recharge my speaker. VERY disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Moises Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Not really sure if this is built for longevity
customer_reviews.text: I had the speaker for about 6 months and then out of no where it sounded like total garbage. I have never pushed the volume of this speaker to hard, mostly used it in my kitchen while cooking. Then one day I turned it on and it sounded completely blown. Very disappointed as now I can't even listen at a low volume without terrible cracking sounds. It's essentially an oversized door stop now. Major bummer.
customer_reviews.author: William Cenoté

customer_reviews.title: Boom!  Simply amazing speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I have had two JBL Charge 3 speakers for about a year now and have loved their sound quality and overall design. When I learned about and heard the BOOMBOX, I knew I just had to have it. I work a part-time job fixing up rental units and listen to music all day. This BOOMBOX is simply amazing. The sound quality is great, the bass that comes out of those 2 4" bass radiators is awesome. The speaker isn't heavy and cumbersome, it is simply a perfect design. It's not a cheap speaker either, but I would highly recommend this bad boy.
customer_reviews.author: Corbinwaterski

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this for me for my birthday and I couldn’t be happier, the quality of sound on this is amazing! It’s so loud I can hear it from all over my house. You can set it to indoor or outdoor noise. I’m thinking of buying the smaller ones so I can sync it to party mode and have it everywhere! It’s very portable too! Very easy set up! I haven’t used it for more than an hour straight so I would have to update my review once I have used it for longer than that to see how the battery life holds up! For right now though, awesome five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: Great until it started acting up.
customer_reviews.text: It's been less than a week before this started acting up. At first, everything was fine. Powered up, charged, and worked great. I will say that I am very impressed at how much sound this boombox produces at half volume. Now for some reason the power button has a mind of its own. Sometimes it won't turn on, and sometimes it won't turn off! You have to press down firmly on the play button at the same time you press the power button to get it to work. It weird, but can recreate the problem reliability. Come on JBL, get your QC game on.
customer_reviews.author: eric menard

customer_reviews.title: Came with the wrong power mains
customer_reviews.text: Speaker is decently-loud, I have several Flip 4's, so I am biased for JBL bluetooth speakers. I was excited to get the package, but sad that I got both a UK (IEC60320-C7 to Type G) and an EU (...Type C). Nowhere, either on Amazon or on the box, did it say what type of plug or what country. I had to order an IEC60320-C7 to Type A (USA) plug for $5, but now I have options to travel with this bad boy! It is heavy, I love the deep green color, and so far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: teh Roy

customer_reviews.title: Just click buy now
customer_reviews.text: I have spent over $10,000 on 1 car stereo system in times past of course my system included competition class jbl speakers and rockford fostgate amps....I promise you that you will not find a better portable system with this much sound anywhere....you will hear highs, lows and the mids. The clarity is perfect. The distortion is none existent. You can tell this is JBL. JBL did it again. You guys rock.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great sound - it'll wake the neighbors
customer_reviews.text: This thing rocks. You get nice low-end that is usually missing from smaller speakers. It's not exactly "throw it in a backpack and go". I use it on my porch/patio and I love the sound.
customer_reviews.author: J. Booker

customer_reviews.title: IT'S NOT A BOOMBOX
customer_reviews.text: It's not a boombox, if there's no BOOM! I'm extremely disappointed at JBL Company. It's shaped like a boombox, but there's nothing booming about this bluetooth. Where JBL messed up was making it waterproof. By making it waterproof, there's no bass tunnel to exhaust the pressure. Therefore there's no booming bass. For $450 I can't emphasize enough about the bass. I bought a bluetooth speaker from Aiwa for $300 and the mids and highs sound great and it has definitely more "Booming" (Bass) to it. Immediately returned.
customer_reviews.author: Oso & Gata

customer_reviews.title: Best boom for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: This is a badass speaker. I bring this to pool partys, softball, camping, and so many other places. Easy to carry and the sound is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this boom box for a few weeks now and have used it daily poolside. This speaker packs some punch! Sound is GREAT! Bass is impressive. Sounds just as good, if not better, than a relatives BOSE speaker and was $200 cheaper. Battery life is AWESOME. We’ve charged it once in like 3 weeks and let it play for hours at a time. If you are looking for something light and compact, definitely do not get this. It’s bulky and kind of heavy but I love that with kids using it and playing around it. Seems VERY sturdy. Super impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Box and Very Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: I finally found time to open my JBL Boombox that I bought about a month ago and what do I find, damaged goods. I was so excited to finally open it. There was no indication that it was damaged until I saw the inner box, which there is a picture to show the damage and what I saw. It must have been hit really hard by something to cause that to break through the box and the speaker. Totally unhappy! I went to see if I can return it for a new one and the date has passed. Sucks. Need help on how to fix this!!!
customer_reviews.author: th

customer_reviews.title: This is such a awesome speaker. I did expect it to be a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is such a awesome speaker. I did expect it to be a little louder for how expensive it is, but it is so fun to take anywhere you wants to outdoors!!! i bought the Hard EVA Travel case for protection while traveling, which i think is a must. if your looking for a high quality speaker you will use indoors and out. this is it. I do wonder if they will add the connect plus option for old JBL speakers so you can connect them via bluetooth or not. Overall i love love love JBL
customer_reviews.author: ABI2010

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome speaker! I was a little hesitant due to the price on whether I needed it THAT bad, but it being waterproof I decided to give it a shot! It has bass but, it’s not going to rattle your house like a pair of 12” subs. Turned all the way up, it is loud! The battery lasts me a few weeks (I don’t use it everyday). Excellent quality if you want a durable speaker that sounds awesome! But, remember this gets tunes to the party, it’s not going to be perfect in every aspect like a home theatre system!
customer_reviews.author: TooManyToys

customer_reviews.title: Sound to size ratio.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding!! Bought it to play music while i packed for a move. This thing impressed me and i am the type that listens to music from a receiver and speakers like BW. Its not perfect but I wont over analyze the speaker considering its function, portability.its got power it will make the room your playing it vibrate for sure. Great battery life. I did notice theres a big difference in performance when its plugged in sounds almost twice as good. I cant even imagine what two of these linked would sound. Unfortunately the price would be too much for my liking. All in all tremendously impressed with the sound that comes out from this boombox concidering its size. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Semper Fi

customer_reviews.title: More TREBLE less BASS
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a nice speaker that gets very loud. It has good high pitch sound/ crystal clear sounds but I think it lacks bass. In order to hear bass the volume has to be loud! I was kinda disappointed but its still a good speaker! If you want a speaker with lots of bass I wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: There’s nothing quite like this speaker. Snagged it on Prime Day for a good price (still pretty expensive) and it was worth it. This thing is LOUD and giant. Haven’t tested it outside yet but I didn’t put the volume past 50% because it was literally shaking the floor and I didn’t wanna disturb the neighbors lol. The sound quality is unreal, and the bass packs a BIG punch. You can’t find a better portable and wireless speaker - plus it’s waterproof! It does take a while to charge (got it with 0% power) but it lasts up to 24 hours of continuous play which is crazy. If you got the money, just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: 2 is better than 1, 10 is better than 2
customer_reviews.text: I started with the extreme2's and they crank great but the boombox absolutely blows everything else away! So I now have 10 boomboxes around my 2 acre estate which is way better and cheaper than doing expensive outdoor speakers. The only downside is the recharging so I am installing electrical outlets all over my yard, problem solved. Now my yard plays birdsong sounds, tribal drum beats and I feel like I'm on vacation when I'm at home. The connect+ app sucks but no need for it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Quality sound and battery life - happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've used it for a few months now and am very happy with the product. Sounds quality is awesome, with very rich bass. I literally listen to all kinds of music and it hasn't disappointed at all across all of those genres. Battery lasts a really long time and is never a concern even out at an all day event. Yes it is a little big and a little heavy, but I am from the boom box generation and this thing is essentially like those old boxes that you used to tote to the park when you wanted to skate with your friends, except the sound is way better!
customer_reviews.author: B. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth for parties and loud listening
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure 5 Stars is enough, this thing is awesome!!! More than loud enough to set outside my shop and be able to clearly hear anywhere on my 3 acres. Loud clear bass, it sounds as loud and as much bass as a high quality bookshelf system.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Buy this speaker
customer_reviews.text: The JBL brand is the very best bluetooth speaker I've owned (and I've tried several at our worksites). I was hesitant about the price, but it is SO worth it. This puppy fills the room, fills the area, fills your soul in a way that lesser speakers can't. You can visibly see the ends pumping out the bass and it feels natural. I'm a bricklayer surrounded by lots of noise and no other bluetooth speaker comes close to this one. Nothing gets between me and my rock&roll. Buy it. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound, fantastic volume
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This thing is everything dialed to 10. Sound output is fantastic, both quality and volume. The Bluetooth range is fantastic. I was very skeptical of buying this unit based solely on the price, even on sale at $280. I am so glad I did, compared to the $50 speakers I have used in the past this is easily more than 6x better in every way. The only negative I can even stretch to think of is that it is heavy, but that comes with high quality batteries and drivers. Its not like I carry my speakers around with me anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Dan P.

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker lots of bass!
customer_reviews.text: It is a great Bluetooth speaker! Battery like is solid, has bass for dayysss! Links up well with other jbl speakers. The only thing I would have to say that I was expecting was that it was going to be louder and the mid range is not the best BUT!!! It is still a great speaker and I would buy again! I link my charge 4 up to it and sound is amazing!!! If your on the fence about this speaker you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME SOUND, although large
customer_reviews.text: No issues, it has HUGE sound! I really like the fact that the battery lasts as long as it does. I would say that it can probably exceed the manufacturer's claim of 24 hours, especially if you use it indoors mostly and at or less than 50% volume. Added bonus that you can charge 2 USB devices off of its main battery. I was also impressed at how quickly it charges. 20,000maH battery is pretty large, and this will charge within a few hours. Definitely recommend this to anyone wanting big sound!
customer_reviews.author: William Allen Horton

customer_reviews.title: BOOOOOOOM!!!! Love this speaker
customer_reviews.text: I vetted many speakers before making this purchase, consisting of Bose's, UE's, other Harmon Kardons, and others. This is by far the best portable speaker. Very crisp vocals and booming bass. I love it. Durability is good, very strong and well constructed. I gave it 4 stars because it does have the two bass radiators on the side that could become problematic if punctured or messed with by sayy... a child. It is a cool aspect and I love it, but it seems to be the weak point.
customer_reviews.author: Tony K

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding speaker, buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker, it sounds great and I am glad I purchased, was a bit hesitant about the size at first, but I was tired of the tinny smaller speaker sound. I really wanted to rock out while on my paddle boards and I’ll say again this thing rocks, battery life is good I haven’t had it die or power down once yet, it’s been splashed, sat in the sun and darn near submerged while on the water with me! Still sounds great! Did I mention that I love this speaker?
customer_reviews.author: Ryno

customer_reviews.title: Oh my goodness—what a sound!
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated at first, thinking that $380+ was a lot to spend on a portable bluetooth speaker. But boy oh boy, when I blasted some of my favorite music, I knew that the $$$ was well spent. I’ve already made some money with it—I’m a part-time deejay and have played a couple of small gigs with it. I don’t regret my purchase at all, and in fact, I know I have inspired some sales. Thanks, JBL, and you’re welcome!
customer_reviews.author: patskywriter

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Sound Performance
customer_reviews.text: About two months with this speaker and I don't get enough of how cool it is. My 2nd speaker out of JBL and looking forwards to more. What else can I say than what is already said? The good battery life, sound volume and power. And it's waterproof! Thank you JBL, very cool!
customer_reviews.author: Edwin

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as loud as expected.
customer_reviews.text: The speaker is awesome. I did think it was going to be a bit louder. But, The sound quality is great and loud enough.
customer_reviews.author: S. Scanlan

customer_reviews.title: Magnificent Work of Art!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best "Boombox" I owned. Love the speaker output and the sound quality. The B.A.S.S is booming and hitting. When you talk about art, you have to mention the JBL BOOMBOX cause this a masterpiece that cant be repeated. Buy one and you will see!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Dagrin

customer_reviews.title: Boombox
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker! I have the jbl extreme 2 and i love it, but the battery life wasn't as long lasting as the boombox and of course the sound on the boombox is much louder and clear. I use the boombox for outdoor partying or just grilling/cooking out doors. I was going to buy the jbl party box 300 but the size and portability and battery life wasn't as convenient as the boombox. Im very happy that i ended up getting this.
customer_reviews.author: simeon f waathan

customer_reviews.title: PFM Battery and sound
customer_reviews.text: Believe the hype. Sound, battery life, function all A+. This is the most I've spent on a portable speaker before and I'm sad to say I can't look back at budget speakers again. My wife was not so happy when I spent $400 on this, but after listening to it, she's in agreement. It's a keeper. I'm bummed the boombox 1 won't link with the 2, but it will link with every JBL built before 2020, which is the current majority.
customer_reviews.author: greg g.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality and bass response!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an upgrade to my JBL Xtreme. It is well worth the money and I use it to play my own recorded music I have saved on a memory card on my android ohine as well as Pandora in my small business manufacturing shop. It's also great around my home pool. My love for JBL speakers began in high school and I got my first pair of L100's while in college in 1977. I paid $333 each for them and still enjoy them to this day! This boom box even has better bass response than my L100's. I definitely recommend this premium sound device!
customer_reviews.author: BEJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I was gonna purchase the JBLBB2, but after watching the reviews and side by side comparisons, the BB1 is the better purchase. You get better battery life (20,000mAh vs 10,000mAh) JBL cut the battery life in half. You also have the "indoor" and "outdoor" apps. This feature is outstanding. On the BB2, they took off. If you are going to buy new speakers in the future, the spend the "BIG" bucks and get the BB2. If not, this BB is just for you.
customer_reviews.author: C. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Little bigger speaker... Lot better sound
customer_reviews.text: I did alot of research before purchasing. This speaker is a little big, but the sound is amazing. For the sound it is small. For a shower speaker, it is a little big, but I still take it. If your not wanting super small, then you'll very happy with this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: A must have purchase
customer_reviews.text: What can I say it’s a JBL! Sound is amazing, nice bass, good treble. Waterproof! I use these around my pool when I am pumping my music. Battery lasts forever. Many pool parties off of a single charge. Compact, so that you can carry wherever you go. Great construction and quality. I believe anyone who wants a great speaker for either the outdoor or indoor would love this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Jason D. Labaska

customer_reviews.title: Wow! What sound!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my birthday party! Talk about power! The sound quality is amazing! No distortion and the sound is crystal clear! Just like the flip 4, it's very easy to setup and sync with your device. Charged it before the party and it lasted the entire time and beyond. It does have some weight so it's not easy to travel with. Was able to purchase it on sale, but it's even worth it at it's regular price. Can't wait to use this again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Torri A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: The best if you want to "Feel" your music!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and tried out the Megaboom III, Revolve +, Fugoo style s, jbl charge 3 and the Marshal Woburn(just for sound and not outdoor/durable comparison. None reproduced the sound as clear and precise as what I believe music should be heard. When I received and played various music through the JBL Boombox. I was sold from the first song. Buy this speaker. You will be amazed at the sound even at 100 percent volume. No distortion, nothing but clear mid and highs accompanied by pure thunderous bass. The sound is perfect for my Metal, Pop, Jazz, and country music.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Bulky heavy, not super loud, just decent, overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy, super big for how loud it is (meaning that it’s not loud at all for how big it is), somewhat durable construction, cool bass subs on either side, definitely NOT worth $350+. Way over priced. It’s just ok. It’s not cheap or horrible but it’s not amazing. I have several Bluetooth speakers over the years and I’ve had smaller speakers with bigger better sound like Jawbone Jambox. If you want bulky heavy somewhat durable with descent bass sound then maybe consider this jbl I guess. I wouldn’t rebuy it. But it’s ok
customer_reviews.author: teresa dekeyser

customer_reviews.title: Quality, great sounding!
customer_reviews.text: I researched the top, large, wireless/bluetooth speakers. I already had a smaller JBL (Charge 3), which is awesome. So, I was leaning towards JBL because you get great quality for a fair price. All the large, wireless, portable speakers are expensive. So, I wanted the one that was easily portable with a great sound. This speaker has everything I wanted. Plus, I love the camo coloring!
customer_reviews.author: Gary M

customer_reviews.title: Not Compatible with other JBL speakers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker because I thought it would be compatible with my other JBL speakers, a pair of JBL Extremes I already own. Both this Boombox Speaker and my Extremes play in "Party Mode," meaning they play simultaneously in unison. However, the Extremes use "Cnnect" while the Boombox uses "Connect+." These are two different, noncompatible formats. JBL should be embarrassed their own products with such similarities (very similar buttons and controls, textures- looks like same line) are not compatible. Total fail. I'll return it.
customer_reviews.author: Some Dude in Delaware

customer_reviews.title: Battery is junk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last may have used it maybe ten times. Battery flashes one red light with charger plugged in. Without charger it does 2 red flashes and dies. I believe it is the battery and have one coming. But very disappointed in this jbl. I hope you have this issue addressed in your newer speakers. I have looked up this issue and there are hundreds of the same issues from others.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin t.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is hands down the best portable I have owned. I took it on my kayak in the Bass river down in Cape Cod and accidentally tested the waterproof features. It held up like a champ, the seal held on the cover and it kept right on playing. The sound quality is amazing! Highly suggest giving this product a try!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I am a ZUMBA and Fitness Instructor and I have been looking for a great speaker that's portable, bluetooth capable and has great sound. I teach 15 classes per week and needed something durable and depandable. I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this speaker. It more than meets my requirements and expectations. I love the long battery life and the ability to charge my devices (IPOD AND IPHONE) while using the Boombox. I teach in a large area and the sound covers the entire room. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dollie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Just doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: The product is great when it works which unfortunately is never. I've had it for about a week. It won't turn fully off and won't turn on. If you Google the issue you'll find hundreds of results from people with the same issue. None of the recommended fixes work. The resetting by pushing volume up and play and the one using Bluetooth and play so not work. There's plenty of videos explaining how to take it apart to try to fix the issue which seems unreasonable. Right now it's a very large very expensive paperweight
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Not 2.4 lbs
customer_reviews.text: At the time i purchased this the description on Amazon was 2.4lbs, i got the item and it was almost 15lbs, took it out and turned it on and its is not very loud, for something this big and expensive i would go with the aiwa exos9
customer_reviews.author: CLAMS

customer_reviews.title: AWESOMENESS
customer_reviews.text: This sucker is awesome! Excellent sound quality! Obviously durable! I'd expect it to be much bigger for all the sound it puts out! While at our deer lease we've left it out over night several times to wake up with it covered in dew and unplugged! It still kicks directly up the next day with plenty of charge & unaffected by the weather! We also bought the case to simply cover our investment & love it too! it's light weight and adds very little in extra bulk!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Horn

customer_reviews.title: Best speaker I've had in a long time
customer_reviews.text: Best speaker I've had in a long time! Love it. Lasted a full week of camping! The sound is second to none...
customer_reviews.author: TechFaith

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I have ever made
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband. The sound is incredible. We are using it with Bluetooth and playing through his phone. The bass is excellent. We haven’t played at max volume yet because it would probably be too loud. We have been married a long time and I think it’s my husband’s favorite gift I’ve ever given him - worth the money to pay for the quality! It is pretty heavy compared to smaller speakers, but the handle is a great feature. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Nice Box
customer_reviews.text: Was everything I expected. Safe from the elements, good battery life, and - most importantly - good strong sound. No problems with bluetooth connections, even from a good distance. I use it by the pool outdoors on a big patio, and it delivers sound beyond what the neighbors can handle. Haven't taken it to the beach yet. It's a bit heavy for carrying with lawn chairs and umbrella to the beach, but I'm sure it would hold up at the shore as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff P.

customer_reviews.title: JBL BOOMBOX  IS THE TRUE
customer_reviews.text: To all the music lover like me, JBL BOOMBOX is a force to be RECKON with as a ex DJ in you can't go wrong the sound is awesome from the high to the low and a long lasting battery and waterproof it speaks volumes before. My co worker brought the JBL BOOMBOX to work I had to get my own it's everything you want in a bluetooth the price is right on Amazon!!!!!,from help me Howard
customer_reviews.author: Howard C.

customer_reviews.title: The Best sound and great quality so far!
customer_reviews.text: Our friend had this speaker and we really were impressed with it. He said that you can pair 100 together, which is awesome. We all have boats and it's awesome to pair them all together for a nice surround sound. The battery truly lasts a long time!! It is also waterproof, though we try to avoid any water splashes at all. We lightly wipe it down with a soft damp rag and gentle soap. not too much soap or water. This speaker rocks and the base is amazing! Plus it was cheaper here than at the local appliance big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: Advanced H.

customer_reviews.title: They’re not kidding when they say Boooombox!
customer_reviews.text: I have been shopping for the right Bluetooth speaker for our backyard by the pool for over two years. I could not be more satisfied with the JBL boombox! It looks really cool it’s clean and simple and easy to transport. Most people today one things really small. As a kid of the 80s I wanted something that had some heft to it with good sound with a lot of base. It sounds like there’s a concert in the backyard. I just love this thing. Pricey, but I got a renewed one. Saved almost $50, well worth the money! If you don’t want one of those little tingy by speakers, you might want the Boooombox.
customer_reviews.author: Will DuBose

customer_reviews.title: JBL - has got their stuff together .. great sound engineering!!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy listening to music ... and when I first heard a JBL speaker 20+ yrs ago .. I was addicted ! I don’t own anything but JBL speakers . When the self powered were introduced .. I was blown away with the CLIP . I recently purchased the JBL BOOMBOX and again .. just amazing ! Incredible Sound .. design .. the bass is just amazing ! You def get what you pay for ! Highly Recommended !
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Doucas

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality A+
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is way better than the Bose Revolve plus. I tried both and this one, knocks Bose out of competition. Good amount of bass and it doesn't loose sound quality even at the maximun volume. 100% recommended. I even tried the Sony Bluetooth speaker that cost similar and still this one is better that those. Its made my JBL and Harman, can't go wrong with it. I love Harman Kardon speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Jenvier

customer_reviews.title: this bad boy is LOUD and very clean sounding
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my son as a Christmas present. Now all our eardrums are broken....Its very loud but clean sounding. Don't really pick up any distortion when played at max volume. Led Zeppelin, Memphis May Fire, and even XXXtentatition (or whatever his name is) sounded real good
customer_reviews.author: Mojojojoe

customer_reviews.title: Rock out, clear sound, great bass
customer_reviews.text: I have revel ultima salon 2's , revel is also a harman kardon co. And Krell electronics in my living room. So I was partial to Jbl. I bought 2 of these babies to use outside together at my pool and deck. Wow, these things kick butt. Had my 75 yr old father in law grooving and a moving. For what these things are meant for, they are awesome. If you can get in the $300's they are a steal. Even my wife, who is notoriously cheap says they are well worth it. Get them.
customer_reviews.author: Charley Gallo

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell ya, this thing his hard, yet crisp. The battery life is exceptional. It's not that heavy to carry, works awesome while sitting under the awning of the motor home sipping on adult beverages! Not a bad choice if you're in need of a nice sounding bluetooth speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: I dont regret it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! It's so retro but it packs a punch! Its heavy-ish so I put mine in a backpack and I dont have a problem. The battery life is insane! The sound is great! I love the rubber bumpers on the edges it got banged around a little on some rocks when getting down to a nice river spot, brushed it off and you couldn't even see a mark.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke R

customer_reviews.title: Big sound.
customer_reviews.text: Day one, I have listened to many types of music and for several hours. Still shows full battery. Sounds awesome. Worth the money, by far best Bluetooth speaker I’ve ever heard. Lots of bass for a Bluetooth. For 350 it is worth it. 3 to 4 times the bass of extreme 2 and that was 300 retail till the recent sale...if you need bigger sound, buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: L Thomas

customer_reviews.title: This has got it - Loudness and Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: We started with the Charge4 which was great in itself but couldn't push the volume that I wanted. Well, the Boombox certainly solved that issue for me. This things rocks the sound volume and quality. so far the battery life is great and we look forward to spending alot of hours jamming our favorite tunes on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Sabens

customer_reviews.title: Choice unit
customer_reviews.text: This boombox sounds great and gets very loud! The base is incredible and the 24hr life at 50% volume is sweet. It's a bit heavy for an everyday bring along but for gatherings it's the one to bring. 2 devices can bluetooth at the same time and which ever device hits play will push to the speaker. You can back and forth DJ if you want. Most recomended!
customer_reviews.author: Matzvey

customer_reviews.title: Early Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old grandson loves this very much! But the neighbors don’t!!!
customer_reviews.author: ronannp

customer_reviews.title: JBL BoomBox Smokes the Competition!
customer_reviews.text: Did quite a bit of research. Wanted something portable for outside by the pool and ability to extend sound to multiple devices. This JBL Boom sets the bar extremely high! Sound quality and battery life is impeccable. Picked it up on sale too which was even a better kicker. This speaker rocks and sounds like there is an actual band playing outside! Well worth the value and hunter green color looks awesome!
customer_reviews.author: J. Coelho

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant when purchasing this particular speaker, the price alone makes you think differently.. I like the feature to switch from inside to outside when playing the speaker. The quality of sound is amazing for this bluetooth speaker and such quality Bass coming from a small speaker. I would recommend purchasing this speaker to jam your favorite songs. It's worth the money...
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Replaces other radio/music on boat
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! The clearest sound no matter what the volume. We had an expensive radio face that you could insert one CD at a time. Not no more, we download free music on our phone and can play it through the JBL via Bluetooth. No more carrying around a book of CD's!!!!! A must buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angel22

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: We use the speaker around the pool and out on the boat it has been underwater and never have had an issue great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Brian McInerney

customer_reviews.title: FUN!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I bought it for my bass boat instead of installing a stereo system. It is big but fits nicely under the drivers console. It is plenty loud and totally waterproof. We hung out with about 5 other boats and swam with it floating the water for about 5 hours one day. It was loud enough for everyone in the area to enjoy it. Battery lasts a long time. I have yet to run it out. Should also double as a coyote call this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie S

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST BT SPEAKER ON TRE MARKET.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I mean AWESOME! I have other crazy awesome stuff from Definitive Technology, Infinit, Harmon etc. I can tell you WITHOUT A DOUBT you will love this thing. 50-20k Hz! Yes please! Frequency response matters! Man does this thing hit!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. Some music sounds better than other. All depends on if it's been remastered . Old music sounds great if remastered . Loud and crisp. I would recommend this to anyone who is going to beach, lake, family gatherings. I use it on my boat when I go out on the water.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I am a dance teacher and I go to various public schools in a day. The sound doesn't get lost outside! Battery really lasts a long time. Heavier than other portable speakers I have had, but doable. I also use as a house speaker and when hosting parties. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This headline pretty much says it all. Excellent sound, excellent battery life, and as far as portability a bit heavy. Everywhere I take it people come up and want to buy it from me. The bass is substantial and everything else, especially battery life, amazing.
customer_reviews.author: DavidHarper

customer_reviews.title: A waterproof boombox!
customer_reviews.text: My all time favorite and the loudest Bluetooth speaker I’ve owned . Clear and Crisp sound with lots of bass. The indoor, outdoor Mode works great and delivers massive 40 watts of Performance power. Including a good 20 to 24 hours of enjoyment on a full charge, And all that while you charge you phone too.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Bitvarda

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Just buy it! You'll be glad you did. This this sounds amazing and is built like a tank! Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: Professional grade!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this speaker, I can turn it on outside on the deck and even at just 1/2 volume it’s rocking the yard while outside doing yard work, or playing with the kids having a cookout etc. It’s truly professional grade speaker quality as is anything JBL makes and that’s why I only purchase JBL speaker. If on full volume I can be 10 acres away and hear the music clearly. The louder it’s played the better it sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Will Pace

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: An early birthday gift for by boyfriend. He takes everywhere. Says its probably the best gift he's ever gotten.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This product is very high quality. It sounds amazing and the battery life is mind blowing. Lasted a full 15 hour shift turned all the way up.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing battery
customer_reviews.text: The battery barely last 7 hours at no where near max volume If I could return this thing I would, but I did not discover this severe battery short coming until after I'd had that damn thing for too long. Sounds great. But, overall a disappointing experience due to the short battery life.
customer_reviews.author: C. King

customer_reviews.title: REFUND
customer_reviews.text: I sent this back for a refund because it was bigger than I anticipated. That was July 9,2020 and I have not received a refund. It was a 399.00 purchase
customer_reviews.author: Brenda G.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: We're very happy with this product. We use it at our lake house indoors and outdoors. Plenty of volume. It doesn't sound like my JBL 100s, but it is fine for what we use it for. Light enough to easily take to the dock and back. Paired to my phone very easily the firts time I tried. Just push the bluetooth button on the front and your device will find it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Sound & quality exceeds every expectation
customer_reviews.text: This boom box is a beast in sound. It is worth every single penny. I researched so many, took the plunge based on reviews and let me tell you I would buy it again & again. Everyone who has listened to this at my house wants to purchase one.
customer_reviews.author: franco&joni

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. Very crisp
customer_reviews.text: This is going to great for outdoors this summer. Had great sound quality. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Johnna

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker, serious bass!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker and awesome sound!! Excellent for camping or inside parties... throws out a serious bass inside and especially outside!! I highly recommend it, the battery lasts all day at full volume the only thing I didn’t like about it was you can’t USB charge it...It Has to be plugged into an AC Outlet or inverter from your car or truck... I did try to float it in a pool but it kept tipping over and facing speaker down in the water, it would be nice if they could work out the balance & buoyancy , overall a great product and worth every penny if you like listening to music.
customer_reviews.author: daniel j.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sound!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't dropped it in pool yet so not sure how water reistant it is, but sounds is crisp and clean even at a louder volume. Love the directional sound...turning radio to one angle or another and it really helps to not blast out neighbors. Great blue tooth reception and no delay at all. Only criticism is it's a tad on the heavy side, but it's otherwise great!
customer_reviews.author: C. Hobson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boombox!! The best!
customer_reviews.text: Best speaker ever JBL made one awesome boombox that actually booms! It was brand new and undamaged I would buy it again if it ever breaks.
customer_reviews.author: HavvkeyeMihavvk

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, but JBL Connect App is not updating firmware.
customer_reviews.text: Boombox rumbles all over the backyard. I need to update the firmware, but JBL Conect App is not working, boombox has firmware 2.0.0 Will contact JBL about it. If not solution is provided by JBL, I may have to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Very, very happy I got this speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I must say, I love this thing. It’s pricey for sure; but, the sound it delivers makes me super happy and I’m glad I invested in a nice speaker. If you put some high quality music through this thing, it’s super nice fr. The bass is plenty for a room, and the outside mode is nice as well. TL;DR: I’m very glad I got this speaker, I love it, and enjoy my jam sessions more than I ever have probably. A worthy investment for a good speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Boles

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Investment! Perfect for Music Junkies...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this boom box! I’ve always been into home sound systems and boom boxes. This by far has the best sounds on the treble and bass. I use it for music, podcasts, or to talk on the phone. Set your iPhone Music EQ to Electronic and you’ll have the best sound in regards to music. That EQ setting on the iPhone gives off the best crisp sound and goes perfect with this boom box!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin1Life

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Bass and Clarity!
customer_reviews.text: WOW is a understatement for this speaker. Yes it’s a little bulky but you get what you pay for and that’s the weight of the magnets on the 2 drivers. Awesome product! Harmon Kardon makes JBL....great bass and clarity!
customer_reviews.author: Jarred

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, easy connection, waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Floats in a swimming pool. Excellent sound quality, easy Bluetooth connection to devices, high quality product. Packaging is serious business - I cannot imagine a scenario in which you could receive this speaker damaged as it is packed for full protection. Gorgeous design, strong battery.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Garcia

product_meta.title: JBL Boombox - Waterproof Portable Bluetooth Speaker - Black
product_meta.description: Color:blackPortable wireless speaker with rechargeable lithium-ion battery, Bluetooth connectivity, and built-in speakerphone - black.
feature_bullets: Made to be the most powerful, portable Bluetooth speaker, JBL boom box delivers monstrous sound along with the hardest hitting bass
Enjoy music for 24 hours without missing a beat. Battery charging time (hours)- 6.5
Use the massive 20,000 mAh battery and dual charge out to charge your external devices anytime and keep music rocking
Rugged enough to handle your wildest tailgate party, The JBL boom box is IPX7 waterproof, which withstand any weather and Even the most epic pool parties
Incorporated four active transducers and two JBL bass radiators, JBL boom box delivers monstrous sound along with hardest hitting bass that you will not only hear but also see

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,843 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
